    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlToolCardLoader

        public XmlToolCardLoader()
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Creates a new XmlToolCardLoader that can load card information from xmls contained in the specified directory.

        It also loads the xsd file which card definitions are checked against.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified directory isn't actually a directory or it isn't readable.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if sax validator or sax parser cannot be used.

      • XmlToolCardLoader

        public XmlToolCardLoader(java.lang.String basePath,
                         java.lang.String listName)
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        The constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        basePath - The directory that contains the xmls.
        listName - The name of the list file containing the names of the available files to load.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if sax validator or sax parser cannot be used.

    • Method Detail

      • createToolCardFactory

        public void createToolCardFactory()
        The method to set the lists that will be used to create the ToolCardFactory.

        It loads the information of tool cards that are in in the file 'cards.list'.

      • addListElements

        public void addListElements(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            Colour colour)
        The method that is invoked be the SaxToolCardParser to add the information of a card to the three lists.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the card.
        description - the description of the card.
        colour - the colour of the card.
